Detailed Description

Structure to read/write to advance DEI registers.

struct Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::bypass

DEI should be bypassed or not.

UInt32 Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::chNum

Channel number for which the configuration is to be set/get. Used only in M2M driver, for display and capture driver set this to 0.

Vps_DeiEdiConfig Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::ediCfg

Edge directed interpolation configuration.

UInt32 Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::fieldFlush

Flush internal pipe for current output.

Vps_DeiFmdConfig Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::fmdCfg

Film mode detection configuration.

UInt32 Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::height

Height of the frame.

Vps_DeiMdtConfig Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::mdtCfg

Motion detection configuration.

UInt32 Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::scanFormat

Scan format. For valid values see Fvid2_ScanFormat.

UInt32 Vps_DeiRdWrAdvCfg::width

Width of the frame.
